snippet: Cliff Sloan, a lawyer with a varied career in government, is expected to be named the next envoy to the military jail on Monday.
abstract: Obama administration is expected to name Cliff Sloan, Washington lawyer and confidant of Secretary of State John Kerry, as new diplomatic envoy for shutdown of military prison at Guantanamo Bay; Pres Obama has pledged to revitalize his faltered effort to close prison.
lead_paragraph: Cliff Sloan, a lawyer with a varied career in government, is expected to be named the next envoy to the military jail on Monday.

headline.main: Kerry Associate Chosen for Post on Closing Guantánamo Prison
headline.print_headline: Kerry Associate Chosen for Post On Closing Guantánamo Prison
